## StabilityDeposit.whatChanged() method

Calculate the difference between the `currentARTH` in this Stability Deposit and `thatARTH`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
whatChanged(thatARTH: Decimalish): StabilityDepositChange<Decimal> | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  thatARTH | [Decimalish](./arth-base.decimalish.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

[StabilityDepositChange](./arth-base.stabilitydepositchange.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Decimal](./arth-base.decimal.md)<!-- -->&gt; \| undefined

An object representing the change, or `undefined` if the deposited amounts are equal.
